trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: 表示 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup" /> 对象集合。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection> class to iterate through a collection of <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup> objects.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection>类以循环访问集合的<xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup>对象。

trans-unit.source: You can access this collection of objects using the <xref:System.Configuration.Configuration.SectionGroups%2A> property or the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup.SectionGroups%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 你可以访问的对象使用此集合<xref:System.Configuration.Configuration.SectionGroups%2A>属性或<xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup.SectionGroups%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection> class is also used in the creation of custom types that extend the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection>类还可创建扩展的自定义类型<xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup>类。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection> class.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection> 类。

trans-unit.source: The following example is an excerpt of the configuration file used by the previous example.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例是前面的示例所使用的配置文件的摘录。

trans-unit.source: The name of the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup" /> object to be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加的 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup" /> 对象的名称。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup" /> object to be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加的 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Adds a <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup" /> object to this <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 向此 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup" /> 对象中添加 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: By default, this method adds the specified <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup> object if it is not already contained within the collection.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，此方法将添加指定<xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup>对象如果它没有已包含在集合中。

trans-unit.source: Clears the collection.
trans-unit.target: 清除集合。

trans-unit.source: This method is a wrapper around the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.BaseClear%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法是周围的包装器<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.BaseClear%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection.Clear%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection.Clear%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: The array to copy the object to.
trans-unit.target: 要向其复制对象的数组。

trans-unit.source: The index location at which to begin copying.
trans-unit.target: 开始复制的索引位置。

trans-unit.source: Copies this <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection" /> object to an array.
trans-unit.target: 将此 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection" /> 对象复制到数组。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The length of <paramref name="array" /> is less than the value of <see cref="P:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection.Count" /> plus <paramref name="index" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 的长度小于 <see cref="P:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection.Count" /> 加上 <paramref name="index" /> 的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of section groups in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 获取集合中的节组数目。

trans-unit.source: An integer that represents the number of section groups in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 一个整数，表示集合中的节组数。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup" /> object from the collection
trans-unit.target: 从集合中获取 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup" /> 对象

trans-unit.source: This method is a wrapper around the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.BaseGet%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法是周围的包装器<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.BaseGet%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The index of the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup" /> object to be returned.
trans-unit.target: 要返回的 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup" /> 对象的索引。

trans-unit.source: Gets the specified <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup" /> object contained in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 获取包含在集合中的指定 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup" /> object at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 指定索引处的 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: This method is a wrapper around the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.BaseGet%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法是周围的包装器<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.BaseGet%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The name of the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup" /> object to be returned.
trans-unit.target: 要返回的 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup" /> 对象名称。

trans-unit.source: Gets the specified <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup" /> object from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 从集合中获取指定的 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup" /> object with the specified name.
trans-unit.target: 具有指定名称的 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: This method is a wrapper around the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.BaseGet%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法是周围的包装器<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.BaseGet%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection.Get%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection.Get%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="name" /> is null or an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="name" /> 为 null 或为空字符串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: Gets an enumerator that can iterate through the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取可以循环访问 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection" /> 对象的枚举数。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> that can be used to iterate through the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" />，可用于循环访问 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection" /> 对象。

trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection.GetEnumerator%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: The index of the section group whose key is to be returned.
trans-unit.target: 要返回其键的节组的索引。

trans-unit.source: Gets the key of the specified <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup" /> object contained in this <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取此 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection" /> 对象中包含的指定 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup" /> 对象的键。

trans-unit.source: The key of the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup" /> object at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 位于指定索引处的 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup" /> 对象的键。

trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection.GetKey%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: The applicable <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 适用的 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The applicable <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 适用的 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Used by the system during serialization.
trans-unit.target: 由系统在序列化期间使用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection.GetObjectData%2A> method is used during serialization; that is, when persisting configuration data to a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection.GetObjectData%2A>在序列化过程中使用方法; 的是，当配置数据保存到配置文件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup" /> object contained in this <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置此 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup" /> 对象中包含的 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection.Item%2A> property to iterate through a <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection.Item%2A>属性来循环访问<xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection>。

trans-unit.source: The index of the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup" /> object to be returned.
trans-unit.target: 要返回的 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup" /> 对象的索引。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup" /> object whose index is specified from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup" /> 对象，该对象的索引从集合中指定。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup" /> object at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 指定索引处的 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: In C#, this property is the indexer for the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 在 C# 中，此属性是 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection" /> 类的索引器。

trans-unit.source: The name of the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup" /> object to be returned.
trans-unit.target: 要返回的 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup" /> 对象名称。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup" /> object whose name is specified from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup" /> 对象，该对象的名称从集合中指定。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup" /> object with the specified name.
trans-unit.target: 具有指定名称的 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: In C#, this property is the indexer for the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 在 C# 中，此属性是 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection" /> 类的索引器。

trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection.Item%2A> 属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the keys to all <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup" /> objects contained in this <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取此 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection" /> 对象中包含的所有 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup" /> 对象的键。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.KeysCollection" /> object that contains the names of all section groups in this collection.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.KeysCollection" /> 对象，包含了此集合中所有节组的名称。

trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection.Keys%2A> 属性。

trans-unit.source: The name of the section group to be removed.
trans-unit.target: 要移除的节组的名称。

trans-unit.source: Removes the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup" /> object whose name is specified from this <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 移除 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup" /> 对象，该对象的名称从此 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection" /> 对象指定。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection.Remove%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection.Remove%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: The index of the section group to be removed.
trans-unit.target: 要移除的节组的索引。

trans-unit.source: Removes the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup" /> object whose index is specified from this <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 移除 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup" /> 对象，该对象的索引从此 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection" /> 对象指定。
